title: Standardized assessment for students graduating from UK medical schools

title_detail.value: Standardized assessment for students graduating from UK medical schools

summary: A new study describes a standardized assessment that ensures that students who graduate from UK medical schools have achieved a minimum standard of knowledge and skill related to prescribing medications.

summary_detail.value: A new study describes a standardized assessment that ensures that students who graduate from UK medical schools have achieved a minimum standard of knowledge and skill related to prescribing medications.
